name: Saving Grace (Tianmaru)
description:
Corrupt your save file to save Grace! Made for Trijam #160: Don't turn it off.

Please enable cookies in your browser settings - they are used to store the save file.

Instructions:

  • WASD: Move
  • Space: Save your game
  • Q: Quit Game
  • R: Reload level
  • F5: Reload Page :)

I had a hard time getting the save system to work for web export - turns out, I should have just used Godot's latest version, silly me.
